message.body: Hey.. can you stop taking my clean towles off my door hook... if you get out of the tub still wet, wet the rug that's what its there for.. thanks
Oh ight i didnt know srry bout that i felt the towel a lil wet
That's ok.. we have a towel hamper for any dirty towels. Its usually inside the bathroom or right outside there

Im gonna sleeo at my cuz gouse
